A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you want to burn down a franchise's mythology why do it in the second movie of the third trilogy? Just burn it down and start fresh and skip TFA. TFA introduced some cool new characters and had some great cliffhangers. TLJ took a dump on them and some people scream \"That is what art is supposed to be.\"\n\nAnd I prefer Jar Jar to Princess Leia space ghost.
